pre_caption: The video begins with a wide shot, where a woman is positioned in the center of the frame, in the middle ground, standing at the edge of a vast green grassy field that occupies the foreground and middle ground. Behind her, a tall cornfield stretches horizontally across the background, with a dark pine forest visible further back, predominantly on the right side, and distant mountains in the far background on the left, under a pale sky at the top. As the woman runs towards the camera, the shot transitions from a wide shot to a medium shot, and then briefly to a close-up where her head moves out of the top of the frame, leaving only her body from the neck down visible in the foreground. Subsequently, as she runs away from the camera, moving towards the right side of the frame, the shot returns to a wide shot, showing her full figure receding into the middle ground. The grassy field remains in the foreground and middle ground throughout, while the cornfield, forest, and mountains maintain their background positions.
